Title: Holly
Writer: Bruce Miller (created by), Bruce Miller (teleplay by), Kira Snyder (teleplay by)
Actors: Elisabeth Moss, Joseph Fiennes, Yvonne Strahovski, Madeline Brewer
Plot: Offred faces a grueling challenge alone as she recalls her life as a mother; Serena and the Commander deal with the fallout of their actions towards Offred.
